activities: Gant Travel collects and uses personal information to arrange and purchase travel-related services on behalf of corporate, association, group, and leisure travelers.  Personal information may also be used in billing, reporting, quality control, and travel services management systems for use by travelers, corporate clients, and Gant Travel's agents and management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, offline, and manually processed data
